jobDescription: Senior Data Engineer / Architect  If you consider yourself an A+ Senior/Lead Data Engineer (or Architect)...WE WANT A CONVERSATION WITH YOU!  We have a simple mission - use technology to make advertising better for consumers and advertisers. We are led by a team of passionate and experienced entrepreneurs who have built multiple billion dollar companies.  Since our founding, we have assembled an incredible group of data scientists and engineers dedicated to our mission, raised significant funding, made several strategic acquisitions, and expanded our offices across the world. And we are just getting started.....What You Will Be Doing
